title: Fullstack Coding Bootcamp
subtitle: University of Toronto
bullets: JavaScript: Mastered high-level scripting language used for web development
HTML: Proficient in creating website structure
CSS: Learned styling and visual design of web pages
jQuery: Explored fast and feature-rich JavaScript library for DOM manipulation
React.js: Learned powerful JavaScript library for building user interfaces
Bootstrap & Materialize: Familiar with popular CSS frameworks for responsive web design
Node.js: Mastered runtime environment for server-side JavaScript
Express.js: Explored flexible web application framework for Node.js
Databases (MySQL and MongoDB): Gained knowledge in relational and NoSQL data storage
Web, Server, and Third-Party APIs: Worked with RESTful APIs for client-server communication; Utilized Ajax, Axios, and Fetch API for asynchronous requests
Project Manager for Project #1: Led team to first place in best project competition

title: The Complete JavaScript Course 2023: From Zero to Expert!
subtitle: Udemy Inc.
bullets: Advanced JavaScript Developer: Became confident and proficient in modern JavaScript development
JavaScript Fundamentals: Mastered variables, if/else, operators, boolean logic, functions, arrays, objects, loops, strings, etc.
Modern ES6+ Features: Proficient in arrow functions, destructuring, spread operator, optional chaining (ES2020), etc.
Modern OOP Concepts: Explored classes, constructors, prototypal inheritance, encapsulation, etc.
'this' Keyword and Higher-Order Functions: In-depth knowledge on 'this' keyword, higher-order functions, closures, etc.
Asynchronous JavaScript: Learned event loop, promises, async/await, AJAX calls, and APIs
Code Architecture and Patterns: Gained proficiency in architecting code using flowcharts and common patterns
Modern Tools for 2022 and Beyond: Explored NPM, Parcel, Babel, and ES6 modules for modern development

title: The Ultimate React Course 2023: React, Redux & More
subtitle: Udemy Inc.
bullets: Mastered React from Scratch
React Fundamentals: Components, JSX, Props, Events, State, Forms
State Management: Thinking about state placement, local vs. global, UI vs. remote
Single-Page Applications with React Router (including v6.4+ with data loading)
Performance Optimization: Memoization, useMemo, useCallback, and Code Splitting
Advanced React Features: useReducer, Context API, cloneElement, portals, etc.
Advanced State Management: Redux, Redux Toolkit, Thunks, React Query
Build Real-World App Features: Authentication, Sorting, Filtering, Pagination, Dark Mode, Charts, etc.
React Behind the Scenes: Virtual DOM, Reconciliation, Fiber Tree, Key Prop, etc.
Build Reusable and Composable Components
Mastered the useEffect Hook
Built Custom Hooks
Styled apps with Tailwind CSS, CSS Modules, Styled Components (CSS-in-JS)
